entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content: I am starting this blog to share some ideas and thoughts related to the research I do. In particular, I plan to share informal commentaries on my forthcoming papers, use this blog to organize ideas and resources that I find interesting, and occasionally write a tutorial on a topic that I want to understand better.
